tasks.label: make
args: -c

echo SPACK_ROOT=$SPACK_ROOT BUILD_ENV=$BUILD_ENV BUILD_TYPE=$BUILD_TYPE PROTEGO_FLAG=$PROTEGO_FLAG GPU_FLAG=$GPU_FLAG BUILD_PATH=$BUILD_PATH MAKE_JOBS=$MAKE_JOBS && . $SPACK_ROOT/share/spack/setup-env.sh && spack env activate ${BUILD_ENV} && ./do_configure --build-type ${BUILD_TYPE} ${PROTEGO_FLAG} ${GPU_FLAG} && cd ${BUILD_PATH} && make -j ${MAKE_JOBS}
